channel.title: Help please :)
channel.description:
i need some client help :)
1. i know how to change background on the client but how do i paste text into the paint file?
2. i got modicon in sprite and admin icon and owner icon but mod uses mod and admin uses admin but i want owner to use owner crown because he is using admin :)
3. how do i change the title on the client?
4. in wich folder do i change sprites
5. how to change the options on the client and change whats inside the options?
6. in wich folder do i type my no-ip or hamachi ip so that others can connect my ip instead off 127.0.0.1?
thx and one more question is comeing about source and client
1. how to get the folders on the source over onto the client that many games have. like the game only use one black box and only one client and u can still get on the server

item.title: Help please :)

item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Ctrl+F the text and actions in client.java and change them to what you want.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please :)
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

[code]1. You can’t paste text into it (unless it’s from another image), you make it with the text tool

  1. Use a tutorial that was made by Galkon or someone at the Client section

  2. Search for the current title in the “client.java” file

  3. The folder that’s named sprites, sometimes in clients they’re named spirts, just have a look around

  4. Explain what you mean by options

  5. Same answer as changing the title, “client.java”

These questions belong in The Client Help Section.

P.S

I do like making my text bold[/code]

thx by answering but on my number 5 i mean that (how do i change the option buttons in top off the client like music and then a list pop up like play song, next song, stop song, previos song and how do i change the play song, next song, stop song, previos song in the option at the client?

Read full topic

item.title: Help please :)
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

  1. You can’t paste text into it (unless it’s from another image), you make it with the text tool

  2. Use a tutorial that was made by Galkon or someone at the Client section

  3. Search for the current title in the “client.java” file

  4. The folder that’s named sprites, sometimes in clients they’re named spirts, just have a look around

  5. Explain what you mean by options

  6. Same answer as changing the title, “client.java”

These questions belong in The Client Help Section.

P.S

I do like making my text bold

Read full topic
